transform_def.name: erfGon
transform_def.string: let r_factor = exp(-log(dot(p_in, p_in))) theta = atan2(p_in.y, p_in.x) + pi() phi = theta - pn * floor(theta / pn) phi2 = if phi > 0.5 * pn then phi - pn else phi nv0 = p_in * (1 / cos(phi2)) * r_factor nv1 = vec2(nv0.x, -nv0.y) / dot(nv0, nv0) r = weight * errFunc(length(nv1)) / cos(floor(0.5 + theta / pn) * pn - theta) in vec2(cos(theta), sin(theta)) * -r
